title: ‘NCIS: Tony & Ziva’ Canceled By Paramount+ After One Season
summary: Ta-ta, Tiva: The “NCIS” story of Anthony “Tony” DiNozzo and Ziva David ends here, at least for now. Paramount+ and CBS Studios announced Friday that “NCIS: Tony & Ziva” has been canceled after one season, and won’t be back for a Season 2. The “NCIS” spinoff starred Michael Weatherly and Cote de Pab…
